text: Goldstein & Blair Publishing was a publisher of Apple Macintosh-related books in the 1980s and early 1990s, including The Macintosh Bible. They also published one of Larry Pina's books. Goldstein & Blair was founded by Arthur Naiman, who also founded Odonian Press. Beginning March 1, 1992 Peachpit Press took over distribution of all Goldstein & Blair titles. ==Notes== Category:Defunct book publishing companies of the United States
